ip_address.browser_headers: Accept: image/gif, image/x-xbitmap, image/jpeg, image/pjpeg, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/msword, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/pdf, */*; Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate; Connection: Keep-Alive; Cookie: smipcomID=1512559;

revisions.revision_20030728: changed "headers" section to "browser_headers" to allow functioning with Zone Alarm Pro
revisions.revision_20031201: changed referrer and query to use escaped characters
revisions.revision_20040106: enhanced proxy checking logic; redesigned to better accommodate registered users
revisions.revision_20040203: added mode section for maintenance mode
